item.title: Deque
item.description: A deque (pronounced “deck”) is a doubly-ended queue data structure in Python. It is just like your regular array, but it has faster append/pop operations! from collections import deque d = deque() d.appendleft(2) d.popleft() d.pop() d.append() It can also support rotation, and other nice features!
